channel.title: Others :: Digital Dilemma
channel.description: I’ve owned a lot of vehicles over the years. Being poor but needing to be mobile, “bangernomics” meant buying cheap and buying often… Here’s some of them. My first car. A 1974 Toyota 1000. Lasted me for many years Mini. Bought for £50 in Plymouth. Started to restore it, but found it was totally rotten with newspaper stuffed into the roof corners as a base for filler. Was towed to a scrap yard
